name: motlin-claude-code-plugins
description: Collection of Claude Code plugins for task management, workflow automation, and productivity

plugins.name: markdown-tasks
plugins.description: Task management system using markdown checkboxes in .llm/todo.md with slash commands for planning, implementing, and tracking tasks across git worktrees

plugins.name: tmux-titles
plugins.description: Updates tmux window title with Claude Code status indicators showing current activity (working, editing files, running commands, etc.)

plugins.name: iterm2-titles
plugins.description: Updates iTerm2 window title with Claude Code status indicators showing current activity (working, editing files, running commands, etc.)

plugins.name: build
plugins.description: Test and build automation tools that loop until all commits pass

plugins.name: code
plugins.description: Code quality tools for comment cleanup and emoji enhancement

plugins.name: git
plugins.description: Git workflow automation with smart commits, conflict resolution, rebase management, worktree creation, and worktree cleanup

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: GitHub Actions troubleshooting and CI/CD automation

plugins.name: java
plugins.description: Java and Maven tools for OpenRewrite import ordering and POM dependency management

plugins.name: justfile
plugins.description: Utilities for working with justfiles, including doc comment optimization

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Core orchestration guidelines for conversation style, code style, testing, tool conventions, and workflow automation

plugins.name: offline-claude-code-guide
plugins.description: Offline fallback for Claude Code documentation when the built-in claude-code-guide subagent fails due to network issues or proxy blocking
